data.name: content
data.description: The text content displayed inside the chip.

data.name: close
data.description: Determines whether a close button is displayed on the chip. Set to false to hide the close button.

data.name: fill
data.description: Specifies if the chip should have a filled background style.

data.name: imgUrl
data.description: The URL of the image to display within the chip. Leave undefined if no image is used.

data.name: imgClasses
data.description: Custom CSS classes to apply to the chip's image for additional styling.

data.name: imgAlt
data.description: The alternative text for the chip's image, enhancing accessibility.

data.name: rounded
data.description: Determines the border-radius style of the chip for rounded corners.

data.name: size
data.description: Sets the size of the chip, affecting padding and image dimensions. 'md' is the default size.
